name: Bubbalon.com
tag_list: social-rating, social-media, social-review, consumer-report, ratings, rate-wine, car-ratins, restaurant-ratings, rate-my-everything
overview:
Bubbalon is a location-based sentiment sharing application, helping people to express their opinions on countless subjects via mobile and online tools.

Using Bubbalon, not only can you share and vote on your experiences in-the-moment as they happen, but you can also get trusted opinions from your friends and experts on a wide range of places, people, interests and things. Users can share online, from their mobile device through their browser, or via our unique integration with Foursquare. Foursquare connection allows users to add sentiment value to places at the same time theyâ€™re checking in.

Users can sign up for free at www.bubbalon.com.

You can also follow us on Twitter @bubbalon.
